body.name: Fresh Products Toilet Bowl Eco Bowl Clip 2.0 Air Freshener - Sample Pack (8 Scents)

features: Create Freshness - The clip works on the outside of bowls (where the seat goes down and stays down) in the ladies room, or the tops of bathroom partitions or the side of tanks in the men’s room to combat odors and create long lasting scents.
Fragrance Evaporates - The clip is secured in place and shrinks to fit as fragrance evaporates, so it does not move after placement.
Easy to use - They are easy to use, simply clip them over the outside of the bowl and watch them shrink as the fragrance evaporates.
Ideal Passive - They are the ideal passive air fresheners for toilets in men’s washroom, disabled washrooms and even ladies washrooms that can all smell a bit off at times between cleans.
Usage - Toilet bowl clips that simply just clip onto the side of the toilet bowl releasing a very pleasant strong fragrance which usually lasts.
body.description: Discreet and secure, the Eco Clip air freshener works great in ladies restrooms to eliminate odors at the source. People care, and they appreciate it. The clip works on the outside of bowls (where the seat goes down and stays down) in the ladies room, or the tops of restroom partitions or the side of tanks in the mens room to combat odors and create freshness. (Also check out Fresh Wave 3D urinal deodorizers for men.) The Eco Clip locks into place to eliminate odors and create freshness. Containing 50x more air freshening than standard rimsticks, the Eco Clip gradually releases air freshener over 30 days. The clip is secured in place and shrinks to fit as fragrance evaporates, so it does not move after placement. Eco Clip is 100 percent recyclable, does not dissolve when wet, or pollute the water. Complies with VOC requirements in all 50 states, North America and Europe. Sample Pack contains ONE clip for each of the following eight fragrances: Cotton Blossom, Cucumber Melon, Ocean Mist, Spiced Apple, Mango, Honeysuckle, Herbal Mint, and Guava Pineapple. (Note: Citrus, Fabulous (Lavender), or Kiwi Grapefruit may occasionally be substituted for one of the other fragrances in the sample pack.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are awesome! 🤩
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed these. Their scent is strong and lasting. Have already bought them multiple times and will continue purchasing them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2016
reviews.reviewText: I first saw these at work and liked the way they work. We are a family of 6 (2 teenage boys, and a man, plus 2 girls and a woman) and only have ONE bathroom! So you can see how we might really need a solution to bathroom smells. I bought the sample pack so I could try them all out. So far so good. All of the scents have been pleasant but I have only used a few. Mango was very strong smelling and I could smell it all over the house for the first few days. I was glad it faded because I didn't want to smell that as soon as I walked in the door though this didn't keep it from working like it should in the bathroom. Cucumber Melon was much more mellow smelling and even though I couldn't smell it all over the house, it did last just as long as mango. They last quite a while. I change mine out every 4 weeks. Another reviewer mentioned that they use theirs for the trash can. I like that idea and I'm going to try it. I will update my review if I find one of the scent to be offensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good product for the money. Scent lasts longer than I expected after reading othervreviews. Only negative is that it's a bit too thick so my toilet seat doesn't fit where it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these. The fragrance lasts very long, months. The material feels like a soft rubber and it fits perfectly onto the side toilet bowl. I also put one in my closet to give it a nice fresh smell. The scent last ten times longer than something like glade air fresheners. Noticeable but not at all overpowering. Each one has a nice scent. I plan to order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: En mi trabajo usan de este producto vendiendo por cinta huelen muy bien basado en eso decidi comprar pero creo que es diferente marca porque el único tiene un aroma agradable es el de lavanda los otros colores no se le siente el aroma

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It leaves a wonderful smell
reviews.reviewText: I would definitely order these again I put them in my bedroom of course the bathrooms, it makes your house smell wonderful and clean. The material is rubbery so it’s very flexible. I will definitely be using this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sample Pack contains multiple substitutions and NO LABELS of scents
reviews.reviewText: In the description, the seller states that this Sample Pack contains ONE clip for each of the following eight fragrances:Cotton BlossomCucumber MelonOcean MistSpiced AppleMangoHoneysuckleHerbal MintGuava PineappleThey then note that Citrus, Fabulous (Lavender), or Kiwi Grapefruit "may occasionally be substituted for one of the other fragrances in the sample pack".Well, I received TWO Fabulous (Lavender), and EITHER Cotton Blossom OR Ocean Mist (no label), and EITHER Cucumber Melon OR Herbal Mint (I'm thinking it's Herbal Mint, because it's STRONG—and I really wanted a sample of the Cucumber Melon to see if it was sufficiently WEAK).I ALSO received Citrus, so that means I've either got Guava Pineapple or Mango. "Guava Pineapple" isn't a listed scent for Fresh Products, and I can't find this scent listed on Amazon. The item I received that is Orange (which would be Mango) doesn't smell like Mango to me, so… again, useless for evaluating this scent.So, the only scents I have that I KNOW what they are are Honeysuckle (which I know I don't like) and TWO Lavender (which I know I hate), and Spiced Apple, which I did want to sample. And either Cotton Blossom OR Ocean Mist, neither of which I'm particularly interested in. And a scent that is NOT Mango and a scent that is NOT Cucumber Melon.What a pointless waste. If you're buying this Sample Pack to sample specific scents… DON'T BOTHER.
